name: FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are using the most current and updated set of complete construction drawings
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Drawings and drawing registers
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
1.2 Implementation of all measures and controls
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS & WP
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, WP
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Confirm manufacturing process with supplier, fencing material shall be laser cut with clean finish.
○ Welding shall be in accordance with AS1554
○ Ensure all components and fastenings are procured to the materials, sizes and grades specified in STD_T6000
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Confirm sleeves are set out to locations specified on design drawings
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure fencing is isolated and earthed to achieve electrical isolation. Lug shall be fitted to baseplate at specified fencing location
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Location of post sleeve's must align with the provided design drawings & 2.4m spacing.
○ Core two 100mm dimater, 300mm deep holes per panel at 2400mm centres.
○ Insert post sleeve and secure using non-shrink structural grout.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Post shall be installed to designated height and level, The top of fence base plate shall be level with surrounding pavement
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Surface shall be cleaned before application of structural fill grout
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: 5mm cap plate on handrail returns
○ All sections to be welded as per AS 1554
○ All sharp edges and welds to be ground back to smooth finish
○ Domed buttons to be welded on top of handrail 150mm from the post centreline
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Align fencing panel such that the posts sit securely in the installed post sleeves.
○ Ensure fence panel is free of damage and is positioned in accordance with the design line and level.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
